name: Shots
description:
Shots is a PvP action multiplayer shooter game with a lots of weapons!

The game includes right now:
14 skins for 5 firearms,1 knife, 1 grenade, 4 attachments, 10 separate magazines, 18 bullet types and a map.

Maps that are ready right now:

- Abandoned Factory
- Dark Forest
- Modern City
- Science Lab
